name: Fire Axe [1]
description: The axe with the power of fire. Using the latest craftsmanship, Fire Ore is combined with the Rune array to make the axe.

name: Fire Axe [2]
description: The axe with the power of fire. Using the latest craftsmanship, Fire Ore is combined with the Rune array to make the axe.

name: Fire Controlling Alloy
description: Increases fire M.Dmg/Dmg by 15% for 6 min. Becomes immune to 1 of the 4 immune alloys for 10 min: Fire/Ice/Hurricane/Earth. Cannot work with 4 mastery alloys.

name: Fire Crystal
description: A red crystal made from the condensation of a burning flame. I can feel the warm afterheat when I hold it in my hand .

name: Fire Egg
description: The egg with fire attribute. After use, Your attack turns into fire attribute and the effect lasts 30 minutes. Unable to coexist with Flame Heart.

name: Fire Hat
description: The most popular hats among female adventurers recently - and some male adventurers are said to get crazy for it?

name: Fire Hat [1]
description: The most popular hats among female adventurers recently - and some male adventurers are said to get crazy for it?

name: Fire Hat[1] Blueprint
description: The most popular hats among female adventurers recently - and some male adventurers are said to get crazy for it?

name: Fire Immunity Alloy
description: Immune to all Fire Damage for 1 min. Becomes immune to 1 of the 4 immune alloys for 5 min: Fire/Ice/Hurricane/Earth.

name: Fire Knife [1]
description: Daggers with the power of fire. Using the latest craftsmanship, Fire Ore is combined with the Rune array to make the sword.

name: Fire Knife [2]
description: Daggers with the power of fire. Using the latest craftsmanship, Fire Ore is combined with the Rune array to make the sword.

name: Fire Mastery Alloy
description: Increases fire M.Dmg/Dmg by 5% for 30 min. Cannot work with /Ice/Hurricane/Earth Mastery Alloy. Cannot work with 4 mastery alloys.

name: Fire Ore
description: A small red ore. It has fire attribute and can be made into Flame Heart after extraction.

name: Fire Resist Alloy
description: Reduces fire damage by 50% for 5min. Cannot work with Ice/Hurricane/Earth Alloy effects.

name: Fireblend [2]
description: It has the power of fire and a red blade.

name: Fireblend [3]
description: It has the power of fire and a red blade.
